channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Darko -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Darko -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36893|2024-08-04T01:01:59.769Z -- wp%20darko -- responsive%20tabs%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (author or higher user role) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Responsive Tabs (WordPress plugin) <= 4.0.5

item.title: CVE-2024-38670|2024-08-02T04:12:25.997Z -- wp%20darko -- team%20members
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Members allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Team Members: from n/a through 5.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-29797|2024-08-02T01:17:57.231Z -- wp%20darko -- grid%20shortcodes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Darko Grid Shortcodes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Grid Shortcodes: from n/a through 1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-38670|2024-07-20T08:00:04.856Z -- wp%20darko -- team%20members
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Members allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Team Members: from n/a through 5.3.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31928|2024-06-04T17:36:00.991Z -- wp%20darko -- top%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Darko Top Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Top Bar: from n/a through 3.0.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-29797|2024-06-04T17:57:24.497Z -- wp%20darko -- grid%20shortcodes
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Darko Grid Shortcodes allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Grid Shortcodes: from n/a through 1.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-45635|2024-06-07T17:12:12.857Z -- wp%20darko -- responsive%20tabs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in WP Darko Responsive Tabs allows Code Injection.This issue affects Responsive Tabs: from n/a before 4.0.6.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Team Members allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Team Members: from n/a through 5.3.3.
